Get prediction matrix for a fitted GAM

anlz_prdmatrix.Rd

Get prediction matrix for a fitted GAM

anlz_prdmatrix(mod, doystr = 1, doyend = 364)

Arguments

mod

input model object as returned by anlz_gam
doystr

numeric indicating start Julian day for extracting averages
doyend

numeric indicating ending Julian day for extracting averages

Value

a data.frame with predictors to use with the fitted GAM

Details

Used internally by anlz_avgseason and anlz_metseason, not to be used by itself

Examples

library(dplyr)

# data to model
tomod <- rawdat %>%
  filter(station %in% 34) %>%
  filter(param %in% 'chl')

mod <- anlz_gam(tomod, trans = 'log10')
anlz_prdmatrix(mod, doystr = 90, doyend = 180)

#> # A tibble: 2,639 x 4

#>  9 1991-04-08  1991    98     1991.
#> 10 1991-04-09  1991    99     1991.
#> # … with 2,629 more rows
